# DynamicGenerationSchema

**Structure**

The dynamic counterpart to the generation schema type that you use to construct schemas at runtime.

## Declaration

```swift
struct DynamicGenerationSchema
```

## Overview

An individual schema may reference other schemas by name, and references are resolved when converting a set of dynamic schemas into a [doc://com.apple.foundationmodels/documentation/FoundationModels/GenerationSchema].

## Creating a dynamic schema

- **init(arrayOf:minimumElements:maximumElements:)**: Creates an array schema.
- **init(name:description:anyOf:)**: Creates an any-of schema.
- **init(name:description:properties:)**: Creates an object schema.
- **init(referenceTo:)**: Creates an refrence schema.
- **init(type:guides:)**: Creates a schema from a generable type and guides.
- **DynamicGenerationSchema.Property**: A property that belongs to a dynamic generation schema.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
